text: Kabona anaatangiririranga ekibiina ky’abaana ba Isirayiri bonna, era bwe batyo banaasonyiyibwanga; kubanga baasobya mu butagenderera, ate banaabanga baleese ekiweebwayo eri Mukama Katonda ekyokebwa ku muliro, era n’ekiweebwayo eri Mukama Katonda olw’ekibi olw’ekisobyo kyabwe ekitaali kigenderere.
